pages.text: ForageCraft is still under constant development and I'd love to hear your feedback! If you want to view ForageCraft's source code, report an issue, or start a forum on the Discussions tab, feel free to check out ForageCraft's GitHub page!

If you want to have a chat about the mod or anything at all, feel free to join the Jonathing Projects discord server. It's a server I opened up exclusively for my personal projects and I don't plan on expanding it to anything else, but feel free to hop on by to say hi!
